title_narrative: for a workshop on South-South cooperation and strategic planning for the Southern Voice network
description_narrative: Under this grant the Science, Technology and Innovation Policy Research Organization (STIPRO) will host a workshop of Southern Voice, a network of think tanks from the global south collectively engaged in the Post-2015 Sustainable Development Goals. The workshop has two objectives: 1) to establish a methodology for a research program on South-South collaboration; and 2) to advance strategic planning for the future effectiveness and sustainability of the network.
